Name: Jack Punch
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Vanilla hints in the whiskey and liqueur combine to dominate this fruity long drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 at Townhouse, London, England.
